summary: Timely reporting of employee wage and tax information helps authorities detect tax fraud, enforce tax laws, compute Social Security benefits, and combat identity theft. Congress moved up the deadline for all employers to report this information—including federal employers. Federal agencies generally use four shared service centers to process and transmit their employees' tax information to states and the IRS. We found the centers, for the...
title: Tax Information Returns: Shared Service Centers Generally Transmitted Federal Wage and Tax Data on Time for Tax Year 2016
